A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie\, though better than Star Wars the Force Awakens\, continues the disturbing trend of identity politics in these blockbuster movies nowadays.   I found the use of unlikely heroes who would probably not be able to accomplish the feats of heroism attributed to them in this movie to be disconcerting at best and fraudulent at worst.  When will they get back to a more authentic depiction consistent with the original casting?
